subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Not attested in pre-[[Tang]] texts. It may ultimately have been a fusion of {{ltc-l|女郎|lady|id=1,1}} ({{zh-ref|Coblin, 1994}}).

Alternatively, it may be a loan from {{cog|trk-pro|[[*ana]] ~ [[*eńe]]||mother}}; compare {{cog|tr|ana}} and {{cog|ug|ئانا}} ({{zh-ref|Vovin and McCraw, 2011}}).
